name: Simple Insurance Tracker
description: Know exactly how much insurance coverage you have and how much you're paying for itInsurance Tracker is a management tool for keeping track of all your insurances policies and enables quick access to critical information (e.g. policy number, contact numbers) when emergencies happen.Features Auto-calculate monthly/yearly payments based on frequency of premiums by subscription typeTotal monthly/yearly payment by insurance typeAttach important information for access anytime and anywhere Policy numb
features: Auto-calculate monthly/yearly payments based on frequency of premiums by subscription type; Total monthly/yearly payment by insurance type; Attach important information for access anytime and anywherePolicy numberPolicy documentsContact numbers; Policy number; Policy documents; Contact numbers; Search, filter and sort insurance policies; Notion template; Tutorial guide on how to use the template; Sample entries included to demonstrate usage
